for the ERC-7984 Confidential Fungible Token standard. This interface defines a standard for confidential fungible tokens where balances and transfer amounts are represented as encrypted pointers (bytes32). The resolution and manipulation of these pointers is implementation specific. See https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-7984","events":{"AmountDisclosed(bytes32,uint256)":{"details":"Emitted when an encrypted amount is disclosed.","params":{"amount":"The plaintext amount that was disclosed","handle":"The encrypted amount pointer that was disclosed"}},"ConfidentialTransfer(address,address,bytes32)":{"details":"Emitted when a confidential transfer occurs.","params":{"amount":"The encrypted amount pointer","from":"The sender address (zero address for mints)","to":"The recipient address (zero address for burns)"}},"OperatorSet(address,address,uint48)":{"details":"Emitted when an operator is set or unset.","params":{"holder":"The token holder who set the operator","operator":"The operator address","until":"The timestamp until which the operator is valid (0 to revoke)"}}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"confidentialBalanceOf(address)":{"details":"Returns the encrypted balance of an account.","params":{"account":"The address to query"},"returns":{"_0":"The encrypted balance as a bytes32 pointer"}},"confidentialTotalSupply()":{"details":"Returns the encrypted total supply of tokens.","returns":{"_0":"The encrypted total supply as a bytes32 pointer"}},"confidentialTransfer(address,bytes32)":{"details":"Transfers tokens confidentially.","params":{"amount":"The encrypted amount pointer","to":"The recipient address"},"returns":{"_0":"The actual transferred amount pointer"}},"confidentialTransfer(address,bytes32,bytes)":{"details":"Transfers tokens confidentially with additional data.","params":{"amount":"The encrypted amount pointer","data":"Additional data (e.g., ZK proof)","to":"The recipient address"},"returns":{"_0":"The actual transferred amount pointer"}},"confidentialTransferFrom(address,address,bytes32)":{"details":"Transfers tokens on behalf of another account.","params":{"amount":"The encrypted amount pointer","from":"The sender address","to":"The recipient address"},"returns":{"_0":"The actual transferred amount pointer"}},"confidentialTransferFrom(address,address,bytes32,bytes)":{"details":"Transfers tokens on behalf of another account with additional data.","params":{"amount":"The encrypted amount pointer","data":"Additional data (e.g., ZK proof)","from":"The sender address","to":"The recipient address"},"returns":{"_0":"The actual transferred amount pointer"}},"decimals()":{"details":"Returns the number of decimals used for display operator"},"returns":{"_0":"True if the spender is an authorized operator"}},"name()":{"details":"Returns the name of the token."},"setOperator(address,uint48)":{"details":"Authorizes an operator to confidentialBalanceOf(address).details: Returns the encrypted balance of an account.

returns._0: The encrypted balance as a bytes32 pointer

confidentialTotalSupply().details: Returns the encrypted total supply of tokens.

returns._0: The encrypted total supply as a bytes32 pointer

confidentialTransfer(address,bytes32,byt.details: Transfers tokens confidentially with additional data.

confidentialTransferFrom(address,address.details: Transfers tokens on behalf of another account.
Transfers tokens on behalf of another account with additional data.

decimals().details: Returns the number of decimals used for display purposes.

isOperator(address,address).details: Returns whether an operator is authorized for a holder.

returns._0: True if the spender is an authorized operator

name().details: Returns the name of the token.

setOperator(address,uint48).details: Authorizes an operator to transfer tokens on behalf of the caller.

params.until: The timestamp until which the authorization is valid

symbol().details: Returns the symbol of the token.
